matcher.options: count(sum by(namespace, deployment) (kube_deployment_status_replicas_available{deployment=~"(amf-comm|amf-ancntl|amf-loc|amf-anintf|nf-idalloc|nf-tmevent|smf-pdusess|smf-pfcpc|sms-pfcpu|upf-pfcpc)",job="kube-state-metrics",namespace="amfmme-oambt-helm"} == 0) or sum by(namespace, statefulset) (kube_statefulset_status_replicas_ready{job="kube-state-metrics",namespace="amfmme-oambt-helm",statefulset=~"(nf-udsfintf|nf-leaderelection|upf-packetprocessing.*)"} == 0) or sum by(namespace) (kube_pod_status_phase{job="kube-state-metrics",namespace="amfmme-oambt-helm",phase=~"Running",pod=~"amf-comm.*"}) == 0 or sum by(namespace) (kube_pod_status_phase{job="kube-state-metrics",namespace="amfmme-oambt-helm",phase=~"Running",pod=~"amf-ancntl.*"}) == 0 or sum by(namespace) (kube_pod_status_phase{job="kube-state-metrics",namespace="amfmme-oambt-helm",phase=~"Running",pod=~"amf-loc.*"}) == 0 or sum by(namespace) (kube_pod_status_phase{job="kube-state-metrics",namespace="amfmme-oambt-helm",phase=~"Running",pod=~"amf-anintf.*"}) == 0 or sum by(namespace) (kube_pod_status_phase{job="kube-state-metrics",namespace="amfmme-oambt-helm",phase=~"Running",pod=~"nf-idalloc.*"}) == 0 or sum by(namespace) (kube_pod_status_phase{job="kube-state-metrics",namespace="amfmme-oambt-helm",phase=~"Running",pod=~"nf-tmevent.*"}) == 0 or sum by(namespace) (kube_pod_status_phase{job="kube-state-metrics",namespace="amfmme-oambt-helm",phase=~"Running",pod=~"smf-pdusess.*"}) == 0 or sum by(namespace) (kube_pod_status_phase{job="kube-state-metrics",namespace="amfmme-oambt-helm",phase=~"Running",pod=~"smf-pfcpc.*"}) == 0 or sum by(namespace) (kube_pod_status_phase{job="kube-state-metrics",namespace="amfmme-oambt-helm",phase=~"Running",pod=~"smf-pfcpu.*"}) == 0 or sum by(namespace) (kube_pod_status_phase{job="kube-state-metrics",namespace="amfmme-oambt-helm",phase=~"Running",pod=~"upf-pfcpc.*"}) == 0 or sum by(namespace) (kube_pod_status_phase{job="kube-state-metrics",namespace="amfmme-oambt-helm",phase=~"Running",pod=~"upf-pfcpc.*"}) == 0 or sum by(namespace) (kube_pod_status_phase{job="kube-state-metrics",namespace="amfmme-oambt-helm",phase=~"Running",pod=~"nf-leaderelection.*"}) == 0 or sum by(namespace) (kube_pod_status_phase{job="kube-state-metrics",namespace="amfmme-oambt-helm",phase=~"Running",pod=~"upf-packetprocessing.*"}) == 0)
